00129    // Inline method definitions
00130    
00131    /* 
00132    * Return angle energy.
00133    */
00134    inline double CosineAngle::energy(double cosTheta, int type) const
00135    { return kappa_[type]*(1.0-cosTheta); }
00136 
00137    /* 
00138    * Return:
00139    *    F1 = d energy / d(R1)
00140    *    F2 = d energy / d(R2)
00141    * for use in MD and stress calculation.
00142    */
00143    inline
00144    void CosineAngle::force(const Vector& R1, const Vector& R2,
00145                    Vector& F1, Vector& F2, int type) const
00146    {
00147       Vector u1 = R1;
00148       Vector u2 = R2;
00149       double r1 = R1.abs();
00150       double r2 = R2.abs();
00151       double cosTheta;
00152      
00153       u1 /= r1;
00154       u2 /= r2;
00155       cosTheta = u1.dot(u2);
00156 
00157       F1.multiply(u1, cosTheta);
00158       F1 -= u2;
00159       F1 *= kappa_[type]/r1;
00160 
00161       F2.multiply(u2, cosTheta);
00162       F2 -= u1;
00163       F2 *= kappa_[type]/r2;
00164    }
00165   
00166 } 
00167 #endif
